typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE as string,
		{xMedia Group} as string,
		{MEDIA TYPE} as string,
		{xMedia Channel} as string,
		{Agency Channel Name} as string,
		{Campaign Name} as string,
		Account as string,
		LOB as string,
		BU as string,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{COUNTRY CODE} as string,
		{COUNTRY NAME} as string,
		REGION as string,
		{xCampaign Quarter} as string,
		{Search Keyword Type} as string,
		{Search Match Type} as string,
		{Emea Region} as string,
		{Emea Sub Region} as string,
		{xAccount Currency} as string,
		Compliant as string,
		{Agency Owner Market} as string,
		{Campaign Scale} as string,
		{Campaign Objective} as string,
		{Media Brief Name} as string,
		{Impression } as string,
		Click as string,
		View as string,
		{Swipe rate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ParentDataStream
ParentDataStream derive(Compliant = iif(Compliant == "Compliant", "Compliance", "Non-Compliance"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SOURCE as string,
		{xMedia Group} as string,
		{MEDIA TYPE} as string,
		{xMedia Channel} as string,
		{Agency Channel Name} as string,
		{Campaign Name} as string,
		Account as string,
		LOB as string,
		BU as string,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{COUNTRY CODE} as string,
		{COUNTRY NAME} as string,
		REGION as string,
		{xCampaign Quarter} as string,
		{Search Keyword Type} as string,
		{Search Match Type} as string,
		{Emea Region} as string,
		{Emea Sub Region} as string,
		{xAccount Currency} as string,
		Compliant as string,
		{Agency Owner Market} as string,
		{Campaign Scale} as string,
		{Campaign Objective} as string,
		{Media Brief Name} as string,
		{Impression } as integer,
		Click as integer,
		View as decimal(8,2),
		{Swipe rate} as decimal(8,2)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
